recovery_codes.title: Set up two-factor recovery codes
recovery_codes.description: In the event that you lose access to your device and cannot use the two-factor authentication codes, you can use a recovery code to gain access to your account.

empty.alert: No recovery codes were generated for this account yet

query.error: There was an error generating recovery codes

exists.title: Your recovery codes
exists.alert: Make sure you save these codes in a safe place. If you lose access to your device and the codes, you will be permanently locked out of your account.

generate.title: Generate new recovery codes
generate.description: Generating a new set of recovery codes will invalidate your old codes, meaning you will need to save them again.
